title: Top NFL teams, CFB playoff, Lakers, Cowboys, & the Patriots
itunes:title: Top NFL teams, CFB playoff, Lakers, Cowboys, & the Patriots
description:
Colin discusses what the top NFL teams have in common, why the college football playoff is fine the way it is, what the Los Angeles Lakers need to do, why the Dallas Cowboys didn't over spend for WR Amari Cooper, and records the New England Patriots are about to break. Guests include Nick Wright, Kenyon Martin, Joel Klatt, and Mike Pouncey.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
